sentence.Network_en: Their feet will trample on the dead bodies of their perfidious aggressors.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们将从背信弃义的侵略者的尸体上踏过。

sentence.Network_en: In your language traitor means betrayer : one is perfidious, treacherous, unfaithful, disloyal.
sentence.Network_cn: 在贵国的语言中,叛徒指的是叛卖者,一个背叛信仰,两面三刀, 不忠实, 无信无义的人.

sentence.Network_en: The perfidious military attack on our fatherland, begun on 22 June by Hitler's Germany, is continuing.
sentence.Network_cn: 希特勒德国于6月22日对我们的祖国发动背信弃义的武装攻击, 目前攻击还在继续进行.

PerfectNetExp.abs: peremptory adj 断然的专横的强制的perfidious adj 背信弃义的perfunctory adj 马马虎虎的
perfervid 非常热心的perfidious 不忠的，背信弃义的perforate 打洞
[p4:'fidi4s] a.不诚实的,背信的,有异心的 perfidious a.声名狼藉的,恶名昭张的,众人皆知的 notorious   [in'sei5i4bl] a.不知足的,贪求无厌的.
perfetto 佩尔费托, perfidious 背信的, perfict 健全

list.abs: Punic faith ; the perfidious Judas ; the fiercest and most treacherous of foes ; treacherous intrigues ., 背信弃义 ; 背信弃义的犹大 ; 最凶恶 , 最奸诈的敌人 ; 背信弃义的阴谋.
The company was betrayed by its perfidious allies ., 这家公司遭背信弃义的盟友出卖了.
the study of perfidy crime in criminal law of china and other nations ., 中外刑法上的背信犯罪研究.
could not be a product of this perfidious coast ., 是不可能在这种地方出现的.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 16th cent.: from Latin perfidiosus, from perfidia 'treachery'

entry.tran: 背信弃义的；不可信的；不忠的
entry.def: If you describe someone as perfidious, you mean that they have betrayed someone or cannot be trusted.

example.ex: Their feet will trample on the dead bodies of their perfidious aggressors.
example.tran: 他们将从背信弃义的侵略者的尸体上踏过。

means.word_mean: 1. tending to betray; especially having a treacherous character as attributed to the Carthaginians by the Romans;

sentences.sentence: "the fiercest and most treacherous of foes"

auth_sentence.content: If he is perfidious, he must be a thorough-going fraud.
auth_sentence.res_content: If he is perfidious, he must be a thorough-going fraud.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: If he is perfidious, he must be a thorough-going fraud.

auth_sentence.content: Nothing except her own perfidious party.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Nothing except her own perfidious party.

auth_sentence.content: Its colorful means keep us at one remove from the central action, which, in retrospect, is perfidious and shocking.
auth_sentence.res_content: Its colorful means keep us at one remove from the central action, which, in retrospect, is perfidious and shocking.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Its colorful means keep us at one remove from the central action, which, in retrospect, is perfidious and shocking.

stems_affixes.word_buile: confide[v.吐露[心事],委托,信赖]+ent……的→adj.[of,in]确信的,自信的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 秘[机]密的;表示信任的;担任机密工作的
stems_affixes.word_buile: confident[adj.[of,in]确信的,自信的]+ial……的→相信的人才知道
dif不+fid相信+ent……的→不相信[自己]→自卑的
fid信任,相信,信念+uciary……的→相信的→信托的
in不+fid信任,相信,信念+el→不信宗教的人
af一再+fid信任,相信,信念+avit表名词→一再发誓相信→宣誓书
confide[v.吐露[心事],委托,信赖]+ant人→confidant可以吐露真情的人
confide[v.吐露[心事],委托,信赖]+ence表名词→n.[in]信任;信心,自信;秘密,机密
fid信任,相信,信念+elity表示性质→相信的性质
in不+fid信任,相信,信念+el→不信宗教的人
per假+fid相信+y状态→假相信→不忠诚
